subtext: Sweet Mocha and devious Chance, both cute as can be.

text: I love to write and draw.
subtext: Sometimes I make icons. If I could just finish that novel...
90's emo and pop punk has my soul.

text: I'm a huge fan of all things skateboarding.
subtext: Not to brag, but I can ollie a broom handle.

text: I really like working with my hands.
subtext: The proof is in the craft graveyard that is my upstairs closet.
